# f5distributedcloud_rate_limiter_policy (Resource)

Manages an F5 XC Rate Limiter Policy resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Rate Limiter Policy.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Rate Limiter Policy is created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the Rate Limiter Policy.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the Rate Limiter Policy.
